subject: Franchises
lead_paragraph: The sale of the team is being held up because creditors want all of the $300 million or so that Thomas O. Hicks would make on the transaction, not the roughly $270 million he is offering.
snippet: The sale of the team is being held up because creditors want all of the $300 million or so that Thomas O. Hicks would make on the transaction, not the roughly $270 million he is offering.
